duck: Poincaré recurrence theorem, Henri Poincaré's theorem on dynamical systems
Recurrence relation, an equation which defines a sequence recursively
Recurrence period density entropy, an information-theoretic method for summarising the recurrence properties of a dynamical systems
Recurrence plot, a statistical plot that shows a pattern that re-occurs
Radial recurrent artery (anatomy) – arising from the radial artery immediately below the elbow
Recurrent rotation, a term used in contemporary hit radio for frequently aired songs
Recurrent neural network, a special artificial neural network

milestones: Nelson Mandela hospitalised again with lung infection recurrence
Sizzler salad bars shut after rat poison found in food
Australia to subsidise Herceptin for early-stage breast cancer
New York Representative Eric Massa to retire
NTSB announces safety recommendations to be made in aftermath of Comair Flight 5191 disaster
BP report into Gulf of Mexico disaster lays blame on other contractors
Leaked emails show UK RAF were aware of Nimrod problems prior to fatal crash
Communal tension erupts in Vadodara, India
Korean navies exchange fire
New laws to combat 'endemic' Hong Kong bird flu
Mongolia's ruling party wins elections as rioting subsides
UK train driver cleared of manslaughter over 1989 rail collision
Former UN head Annan warns Kenya over future poll violence
Technology Brief for December 14, 2005
Indian Ocean tsunami, one year after
FIFA to make changes after Thierry Henry handball
One year on: IFALPA's representative to ICAO, pilot and lawyer on ongoing prosecution of Garuda Indonesia Flight 200 pilot

wiki.text:
'Recurrence' and 'recurrent' may refer to: *Recurrence relation, an equation
which defines a sequence recursively *Poincaré recurrence theorem, Henri
Poincaré's theorem on dynamical systems *Recurrence plot, a statistical plot
that shows a pattern that re-occurs *Recurrence period density entropy, an information-
theoretic method for summarising the recurrence properties of a dynamical
systems *Recurrent neural network, a special artificial neural network
*Recurrent rotation, a term used in contemporary hit radio for frequently aired
songs *''Recurrence'' (album), a 2008 metalcore album by Vira *Disease
recurrence, also called relapse *Radial recurrent artery (anatomy) – arising
from the radial artery immediately below the elbow
wiki.title: recurrence
